text: Jared Taylor is an American white supremacist. He started the magazine the American Renaissance. Jared Taylor was born in Japan to Christian missionaries in 1951. He grew up in Kyoto and learned to speak Japanese. Taylor moved to the United States when he was 16. Taylor believes that white people should only care about other white people. ==References== Category:American political writers Category:Magazine founders Category:Nationalists Category:White supremacists
title: Jared Taylor
